subject: Steroids
Baseball
Drug Abuse and Traffic
Mitchell Report (Baseball)
lead_paragraph: The Mets’ new general manager presided over the Athletics in the late 1980s when that team was considered an incubator for the early use of steroids in baseball.
snippet: The Mets’ new general manager presided over the Athletics in the late 1980s when that team was considered an incubator for the early use of steroids in baseball.
